header.tagline: Create beautiful cover images for your blogs

hero.title: Making cover images for your blogs is now super easy

section1.title: Why are cover images more important than you think?

feature1.description: Around <1>7 million</1> blog posts are published daily, and with the rise of new writing tools, this number keeps growing.

feature2.description: Quality covers bring <1>higher conversion rates</1> compared to randomly selected stock photos.

section2.title: With coverview, you can create covers in <1>just seconds</1>
section2.step1Description: Fill in blog title and author name
section2.step2Description: Customize with colors, fonts, and icons
section2.step3Description: Choose your style from different themes
section2.step3Subtitle: Unsplash integration, custom icons, build your personal brand.

section3.title: Supported platforms
section3.description: Works with Hashnode, Dev.to, and more

footer.subtitle: Focus on writing, no more worrying about cover images.

customization.title: Highly Customizable
customization.description: 9 color themes, multiple fonts and sizes

converter.title: Image Converter
converter.subtitle: Pure frontend conversion. Paste from clipboard, drag and drop, pick format, then control compression quality.

dropzone.primary: Drop image here or click to upload
dropzone.secondary: Supports clipboard paste, PNG, JPG, WEBP and more

converter.pasteHint: Tip: Press Ctrl/Cmd + V anywhere to paste clipboard image.
converter.qualityHintPng: PNG is lossless, quality slider does not change output.
converter.qualityHint: Lower value = smaller size, higher value = better quality.

errors.loadFailed: Image loading failed, please try another file.
errors.dropFailed: No image found in dropped content.
errors.convertFailed: Conversion failed for this format. Try another format.

iconGenerator.title: ICO Icon Generator
iconGenerator.subtitle: Upload, paste, or drag an image. Crop to square, then export multiple ICO files in different sizes.

dropzone.primary: Drop image here or click to upload
dropzone.secondary: Supports clipboard paste and drag upload

iconGenerator.pasteHint: Tip: Press Ctrl/Cmd + V anywhere to paste clipboard image.
iconGenerator.cropEmpty: Upload an image first to configure crop and icon sizes.

errors.loadFailed: Image loading failed, please try another file.
errors.dropFailed: No image found in dropped content.
errors.noSize: Select at least one icon size.
errors.generateFailed: Failed to generate icon files. Please try again.

q1.question: How do I download the cover image?
q1.answer: Click the Download button to save the image as PNG, WEBP, or JPG.

q2.question: Can I use custom images?
q2.answer: Yes! You can search Unsplash images or upload your own icon.

q3.question: Is it free to use?
q3.answer: Yes, CoverView is completely free and open source.
